data.text: @jazigyn @catladyactivist Exact! It’s just mind-boggling! It’s like she thinks that people need to be able to forget (ignore) that we’re still in a pandemic! How twisted is it to encourage that?

@catladyactivist I'd hoped that the CDC would go back to being the heroes I'd always felt them to be. Not sure how to interpret this "scarlet letter" comparison. Sounds like wearing a mask is a badge of shame, and for others to despise the wearer?? Surely not?
@catladyactivist Hey, when you want to come back from la la land, logic and common sense will be waiting when you get back. “LoNg cOviD” “iTs nOt oVeR”🤣🤣
@catladyactivist @MLS_Dave but but but LISTEN TO THE SCIENCE REEEE THE CDC SAID REEEEE. Lol cope and seethe. Thank you for the free circus on my timeline today!
@catladyactivist @crwequine Maybe she read the Scarlet Letter but she definitely didn’t understand it.
